Plot: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.
Title: Collateral
Actors: Tom Cruise, Jamie Foxx, Jada Pinkett Smith, Mark Ruffalo
tomatoConsensus: Driven by director Michael Mann's trademark visuals and a lean, villainous performance from Tom Cruise, Collateral is a stylish and compelling noir thriller.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 22 wins & 64 nominations.
